text: (upbeat music)
- My name is Soumya Sekhar Das.

I'm a Partner Solutions Architect
in AWS, specialist on SAP.

I work in the worldwide ISV
Strategic Alliance team.

As a PSA, I work closely
with the North America

inside and ISV partners to
host, implement, migrate,

and optimize their customer's
SAP workloads on AWS.
When I work closely with them,
when I build a solution for them,
when I build a optimal cost-optimized,
resilient, highly fault tolerant solutions
for my customers with my partners,
as part of whole innovation that brings
a real satisfaction and real joy to me.
(upbeat music)

It was always fun because
I am doing something
which is a builder's role.
In AWS, we all are builders, right?
We all are leaders.

If you are one of the builder,
if you are one of the leader,
this is the best place to be on earth.

And I completely believe
that AWS helps you
in all the way to carve your own path.

You know, we have so many
orgs, we have so many teams.
We can easily change our team.

We can easily stick our
adhere to our own passion.
And it is not about work only.
We have the work life harmony as well.
I personally do a lot of different things.
I am an inclusion ambassador.

I am part of families at
Amazon affinity group.

I am part of the mental health
and wellness affinity group.

So there are a lot of different
things to do in Amazon.
It will open door for you globally.

So I always encourage people
that if you are a builder,

if you are a leader, this
is the best place to be.
